name: Create A Website Similar To Alumni Portal
body:
About

Are you looking for a way to make your first website? Great, it will help you in building website similar to alumni portal.
Building a website from a scratch can be a hectic challenge.Going through this guide will give you an idea about how to start what are the next steps you should take.
If you get stuck contact me using my website.I answer every single email that I receive.

Author

Adisha Porwal

Hey, I'm persuing M.tech(IT) and a web developer.
